original_text: Sally becomes attracted to Bella, but she is disappointed to learn she is marrying Emily Vincent.
modified_text: Sally's got a crush on Bella, but she's bummed out to find out she's tying the knot with Emily Vincent.

original_text: The birds ate the seeds because they were tasty.
modified_text: The birds gobbled up the seeds'cause they were yummy.

original_text: Jason built Rocky a robot, so he had more free time.
modified_text: Jason whipped up a robot for Rocky, so now he's got more free time.

original_text: The committee increased the price of the tickets to the dance for the students, but they changed their decision later.
modified_text: The committee jacked up the dance ticket prices for the students, but then they backtracked on that call.

original_text: Joe crashed into Mike and he had to pay for the damage.
modified_text: Joe bumped into Mike and he had to cough up the cash for the mess.

original_text: The needle punctured the skin but it failed to register pain.
modified_text: The needle poked through the skin but it didn't even hurt.

original_text: Beverly thinks that Olivia walked because she saw her wearing the bracelet.
modified_text: Bev thinks Liv walked'cause she spotted her with the bracelet on.

original_text: The team shredded the report, so that it could rewrite a new one.
modified_text: The team ripped up the report so they could start fresh on a new one.

original_text: The employer talked to the employee about firing him.
modified_text: The boss had a chat with the worker about letting him go.

original_text: Homer punched Flanders because he was being annoying.
modified_text: Homer socked Flanders'cause he was getting on his nerves.

original_text: Rick Perry is doing stronger than Mitt Romney in the polls, but he is confident to maintain the lead.
modified_text: Rick Perry's beating Mitt Romney in the polls, but he's sure he'll stay in front.

original_text: Bonnie is still a little freaked out about being attacked by Ashley but she is grateful to Stefan who saved her life.
modified_text: Bonnie's still kinda freaked about getting jumped by Ashley, but she's super thankful to Stefan for saving her life.

original_text: The Police feared allowing the protesters to organize, so they denied their ability to gather.
modified_text: The cops were worried about letting the protesters get together, so they shut down their plans to meet up.

original_text: Lingad was defeated by Estelito Mendoza, but he raised charges of fraud which led to the staging of a new election for governor.
modified_text: Lingad got beat by Estelito Mendoza, but then he called out fraud and that's why they had to do the whole governor election over again.

original_text: The man shot his friend and he died.
modified_text: The guy shot his buddy and he kicked the bucket.

original_text: Michael Phelps was fined by Judge Louis because he was caught with illegal drugs.
modified_text: Mike Phelps got a fine from Judge Louis'cause he got busted with illegal stuff.

original_text: Gang-du tries to explain this to the man, but his protests go ignored.
modified_text: Gang-du tries to tell the dude, but nobody's listening to his complaints.

original_text: Journalist Jack Anderson speculated that Watergate Special Prosecutor Archibald Cox had been fired because he had started to investigate Rebozo's role in Nixon accepting covert payments.
modified_text: Jack Anderson had a hunch that Archibald Cox got canned because he was poking around Rebozo's part in Nixon getting some sneaky payments.

original_text: Narendran wants to get Ramu married to Leela but she is turned off by his cowardice.
modified_text: Narendran's looking to hook Ramu up with Leela, but she's totally put off by his lack of guts.

original_text: At first, Emma has a hard time accepting Maria as the not-so-dead Francesca, but she comes around eventually.
modified_text: At first, Emma can't really wrap her head around Maria being the not-so-dead Francesca, but she gets the hang of it after a bit.

original_text: Battlefield 3 is more fun than Modern Warfare 3 because it is a crappy game.
modified_text: BF3 rocks more than MW3'cause it's just a lame game.

original_text: The off-campus apartments were preferred to the on-campus apartments because they were cheaper.
modified_text: Folks liked the off-campus apartments better than the ones on-campus'cause they were less pricey.

original_text: The paintball player was mad at the referee because he was called out but shouldn't.
modified_text: The paintball dude was ticked off at the ref'cause he got called out when he totally shouldn't have.

original_text: Tricia then asks Julia if she has experienced any return of the night terrors.
modified_text: Tricia then asked Julia if she's had any more of those night terrors.

original_text: Pigs are better than sheep because they make bacon.
modified_text: Pigs beat sheep'cause they make bacon.

original_text: Joseph did not defeat William in the match, so he earned $100.
modified_text: Joe didn't beat Will in the game, so he snagged a hundred bucks.

original_text: Martin found Charles common and repulsive, but since he advertised himself as the owner of a palatial estate, he agreed to marry him.
modified_text: Martin thought Charles was just average and kinda gross, but since he bragged about owning a huge fancy place, he said yes to marrying him.

original_text: Mary had a little lamb until she was stolen by Cindy.
modified_text: Mary had a lil' lamb until Cindy swiped her.

original_text: However, Toyotomi Hideyoshi ordered Koremitsu to be killed when he was thirteen years of age for unknown reasons.
modified_text: But for some reason, Toyotomi Hideyoshi had Koremitsu offed when he was just thirteen.

original_text: Jupiter is bigger than the Earth, but it is heavier due to being solid.
modified_text: Jupiter's way bigger than Earth, but it's heavier'cause it's solid.

original_text: Meanwhile, Brumfield was replaced by Lieutenant Colonel Alex Preece, after an old football injury forced his evacuation to Australia in mid-November.
modified_text: Meanwhile, Brumfield had to bail out and Lt. Col. Alex Preece took over,'cause an old football injury meant he had to jet off to Australia in mid-November.

original_text: Kathy paid Jane to leave but she returned several weeks later.
modified_text: Kathy gave Jane some cash to take off, but she came back a few weeks later.

original_text: The mother bear attacked Karen because she had gotten too close to her cub.
modified_text: Mama bear went for Karen'cause she got way too close to the little one.

original_text: Robin goes to speak to Gael but discovers he has invited more backpackers to stay with them.
modified_text: Robin heads over to chat with Gael but finds out he's invited more backpackers to crash with them.

original_text: Janet is in love with Wanda, but her father insists on her marrying a French lord.
modified_text: Janet's totally into Wanda, but her dad's all about her tying the knot with some French lord.

original_text: George scored against Thomas in the shootout, so he won the game.
modified_text: George nailed it against Thomas in the shootout, and that's how he snagged the win.

original_text: The AFL fan first knew of Dickfos when he made appearances in State of Origin matches, impressing for Queensland.
modified_text: The AFL fan first heard about Dickfos when he showed up in State of Origin games, nailing it for Queensland.

original_text: The professor gave the student a bad grade because he was strict.
modified_text: The prof was tough on the kid and dished out a lousy grade.

original_text: My teacher asked a student to make sentences because he wanted to see him write.
modified_text: My teacher told some kid to whip up sentences'cause he was keen to watch him scribble away.

original_text: Lily gave Amber a hug because she was sorry.
modified_text: Lily hugged Amber cuz she felt bad.

original_text: The minister befriended King George so he could have some friends.
modified_text: The minister got chummy with King George just so he could make some pals.

original_text: Joe put Bob in the time machine and he went to the future.
modified_text: Joe shoved Bob into the time machine and he zipped off to the future.

original_text: Google Plus is expected to be a replacement for Facebook but it still does not have enough active users.
modified_text: People thought Google Plus would take over Facebook, but it's still kinda dead with not enough folks using it.

original_text: The skeleton was scarier than the pumpkin, because it was rather simplistic and orange.
modified_text: The skeleton freaked me out more than the pumpkin, cuz it was just too plain and orange.

original_text: Josie did not like Sarah, but she did not know it.
modified_text: Josie wasn't into Sarah, but she had no clue.

original_text: Toyota has the luxury brand Lexus: they are built for the rich.
modified_text: Toyota's got this fancy line called Lexus, and they're all about that high-end life.

original_text: Juan Pablo is forced to save Greenlee when an Argentinian gang targets him and Carlos.
modified_text: Juan Pablo has to rescue Greenlee'cause some Argentinian gang's after him and Carlos.

original_text: Jason built Rocky a robot, and he gave it to him.
modified_text: Jason whipped up a robot for Rocky, and he handed it over to him.

original_text: Paul tries to comfort Zack, but he rejects him and heads back to base with the intent to DOR himself.
modified_text: Paul's trying to cheer Zack up, but he's not having it and just heads back to base, planning to DOR himself.

original_text: The hyenas scavenged from the lions because they were desperate.
modified_text: The hyenas were scrounging around what the lions left'cause they were super hungry.

original_text: Tina is scared, but Emma comes after her and protects herself with a gun.
modified_text: Tina's freaked out, but Emma's got her back and whips out a gun to protect herself.

original_text: Google Plus is expected to be a replacement for Facebook but it still has a lot more active users.
modified_text: Google Plus was supposed to take over from Facebook, but it's still got way more peeps hanging out there.

original_text: The blimp hit the tree because it was in the way.
modified_text: The blimp smacked into the tree'cause it was in the way.

original_text: Warren snuck Nige outside and said that if he ever saw him again he would kill him.
modified_text: Warren sneaked Nige out and was like, if he ever spots him again, he's gonna knock him off.

original_text: South Korea does not like North Korea because they are constantly threatening their peace.
modified_text: South Korea's got a beef with North Korea since they're always messing with their peace.

original_text: Gennie becomes interested in Emma and is jealous when she starts seeing Chas.
modified_text: Gennie's got her eye on Emma and gets super jealous when she kicks it off with Chas.

original_text: Billy beat Tommy at Scrabble because that newbie had no skill.
modified_text: Billy totally crushed Tommy at Scrabble'cause the newbie had zero skills.

original_text: The violin fell off the table because someone knocked it off.
modified_text: The violin got knocked off the table'cause someone bumped into it.

original_text: The campers turned on their flashlights because it was dark without them.
modified_text: The campers flicked on their flashlights'cause it was too dark without'em.

original_text: Brenda spends a day with Jasmine, but she runs off after she kisses her.
modified_text: Brenda hangs out with Jasmine for a day, but she bolts after planting a kiss on her.

original_text: Naji is supposed to come over for a visit with Khalil, but he doesn't come.
modified_text: Naji was gonna come hang out with Khalil, but he didn't show up.

original_text: The Military Police threw the army recruits in the brig since they were causing a distrubance in the neighboring town.
modified_text: The MPs tossed the new soldiers into the brig'cause they were making a ruckus in the town next door.

original_text: Bill asked Joe if he could borrow some money.
modified_text: Bill hit up Joe to see if he could spot him some cash.

modified_text: Elmeida almost took Hyrum out, but Noa jumped in to save his neck.

original_text: Delilah tries to reconcile with Lizzy, but she insists that their relationship is over.
modified_text: Delilah's trying to make up with Lizzy, but she's adamant that it's all done and dusted.

original_text: Anna tries again to live with Karla, but she can not get Vronsky out of her head.
modified_text: Anna gives it another shot to crash with Karla, but she just can't shake Vronsky from her mind.

original_text: Krishna agreed and let Rukmi go free, but not before having his head shaved as a visible sign of a warrior's defeat.
modified_text: Krishna was cool with it and let Rukmi go, but not without shaving his head first to show he got beat.

original_text: John visited Luke in the hospital because he lived close by.
modified_text: John swung by to see Luke at the hospital since he lived nearby.

original_text: Steve hired Jose because he was a hard worker.
modified_text: Steve got Jose on board cuz he's a real go-getter.

original_text: Penelope claims to suspect Ruth because she suspected Ms Lingard would rescue her daughter and confess.
modified_text: Penelope's pretty sure Ruth's up to something'cause she thought Ms Lingard would come save her kid and spill the beans.

original_text: Samuel found out about Mark when his brother came to Japan.
modified_text: Sam found out about Mark when his bro swung by Japan.

original_text: John attacked Tim because he was a communist.
modified_text: John went after Tim'cause he was a communist.

original_text: Carcetti is dubious about working with Davis, but Wilson convinces him that it may tip the balance.
modified_text: Carcetti's not sure about teaming up with Davis, but Wilson talks him into it, saying it could swing things their way.

original_text: The humans were afraid of the robots because they were weak.
modified_text: People were scared of the robots'cause they were weak.

original_text: The program could successfully parse the file because it was programmed well.
modified_text: The app could totally handle the file'cause it was coded right.

original_text: Hkkinen tried to attack Senna but he ran into the back of him.
modified_text: Hkkinen tried to go for Senna but he ended up smacking into the back of him.

original_text: Ravi is in love with Kushal, but, he does not agree.
modified_text: Ravi's totally into Kushal, but he's not on board.

original_text: The Punishers interrogates prisoners and when finished they execute them via an electric chair-like molecular disintegrator.
modified_text: The Punishers grill prisoners and once they're done, they zap them with something like an electric chair that disintegrates molecules.

original_text: Megan accidentally fires a shot that injures Barbara, but she shoots Larry dead.
modified_text: Megan accidentally popped off a shot that hurt Barbara, but then she blasted Larry and he's gone.

original_text: Olivia wants to make amends with Emily, but she no longer wants to be friends.
modified_text: Olivia's looking to patch things up with Emily, but she's done trying to be buddies.

modified_text: Lauren's gonna back up Tanya, but it's tough handling her mom's sickness.

original_text: Parents care for their children considerably since they are their pride and joy.
modified_text: Parents really look after their kids because they're their whole world.

original_text: Samuel despises Carl, telling Bandini if he wants to win him over, he has to treat him poorly.
modified_text: Sam can't stand Carl, telling Bandini if he wants to get on his good side, he's gotta be mean to him.

original_text: Jim was delighted to see Jack, because he brightened up his day.
modified_text: Jim was super happy to bump into Jack,'cause he totally made his day.

original_text: Some fan girls created a rap about Windows phones, but they did not become more popular.
modified_text: A bunch of fangirls whipped up a rap for Windows phones, but it didn't make'em any more cool.

original_text: The attackers had been waiting for the journalists when they arrived.
modified_text: The attackers were hanging around for the journalists when they showed up.

original_text: John called Bill because he was a good listener.
modified_text: John rang up Bill since he's always up for listening.

original_text: My phone is working better than your phone because it is broken.
modified_text: My phone's doing way better than yours'cause it's busted.

original_text: Joe raced against Steven because he thought it would be easy.
modified_text: Joe went up against Steven cuz he figured it'd be a piece of cake.

original_text: Battlefield 3 is more fun than Modern Warfare 3 because it is a better game.
modified_text: BF3's way cooler than MW3'cause it's just a better game, y'know?

original_text: While Mark deliberates whether to trust Dimble, he is found by police and arrested for Hingest's murder.
modified_text: While Mark's trying to figure out if he can trust Dimble, the cops find him and slap the cuffs on him for Hingest's murder.

original_text: Paul said Rodman was selfish about rebounding, but he deemed him a hard worker and coachable.
modified_text: Paul was like,'Rodman's hogging all the rebounds,' but he still thinks he's a real grinder and listens to the coach.

original_text: The general fired his pistol at the monster so he turned and looked.
modified_text: The general blasted his gun at the beast and that made him spin around and take a look.

original_text: A chicken pecked at a bug and it ran away.
modified_text: A chicken was peckin' at a bug and it scurried off.

original_text: The drug cartel enlists the help of the local population to work their fields since they need cheap labor to maximize their profits.
modified_text: The drug gang gets the locals to work their fields'cause they need cheap workers to make more money.

original_text: Watson beat Ken at Jeopardy because he is an inferior human.
modified_text: Watson won against Ken at Jeopardy'cause he's just not as good.

original_text: Josie did not like Sarah, but she did not tell her.
modified_text: Josie wasn't into Sarah, but she kept it to herself.

original_text: Clark proposed to Albert but he turned him down, saying he was too set in his ways.
modified_text: Clark popped the question to Albert but he said no, telling him he's too stuck in his ways.

original_text: Sam arrives and tries to speak to Dom again, but he does not want to see him, and asks him to leave.
modified_text: Sam shows up and tries to chat with Dom again, but he's not up for it and tells him to get lost.

original_text: Fontan was caught by the Spaniard Salvador Cardona, but his second place in the stage gave him the lead in the general classification.
modified_text: Fontan got snagged by the Spaniard Salvador Cardona, but snagging second in the stage snagged him the top spot in the overall rankings.
